name: Night in the Devil's Den
description:
A horror visual novel made over the month of March for #NaNoRenO2021!

Amelia has had a crush on Elias for...ever. At least since they met. But when she confesses, things don't go exactly like she planned. Can you survive the night? Try not to succumb to the violence of the world around you as you navigate an otherworldly school building and meet some potentially friendly faces.

Staff Art

say0ran, paripaws, ruewn, Frostbitten Snowball

Writing

Neale LaPlante Johnson, Frostbitten Snowball

Programming

Neale LaPlante Johnson, ruewn
